name: Meowlediction
description:
Hello !

This is my projectfor the 45th Ludum Dare, theme: "Start with nothing"

Hope you'll have fun !

Commands:

Use the mouse to swipe the cards right or left and make choices (if you're familiar with reigns or tinder, that's the same !).

If no choice is shown, it means there is no choice to be made, just swipe to continue.

You can also play on android for the ultimate swiping experience !

Resources: Fonts:
  • Anime Ace 2 (https://fonts2u.com/anime-ace-20-bb.font)
  • Buenard (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Buenard)
Tools:
  • Made with Unity and Visual Studio Community
Graphics:
  • Photofiltre (http://www.photofiltre-studio.com/pf7-en.htm)
Sounds:
  • Audacity (https://www.audacityteam.org/)
  • sfxr (http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html)
